description.para: Wrapper for the xtk:persist#Write endpoint, accepting a zipped query in order to help bypass length and keyword firewall filters.
Wrapper for the xtk:persist#WriteCollection endpoint, accepting a zipped query in order to help bypass length and keyword firewall filters.
Accepts metadata and a base64 encoded image, and creates or updates an xtk:fileRes record.

The specified folder must exist, otherwise the fileRes is not created. If a different folder is specified from that in which an existing fileRes lives, it is not moved - the folder is only set on creation.
